alert.note: Alert for Archer; Baylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 6:50PM CDT until May 12 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM CDT FOR WESTERN ARCHER AND EASTERN BAYLOR COUNTIES... At 649 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lake Diversion to near Westover, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Megargel, eastern Lake Kemp, Mabelle, Lake Diversion, Dundee, Westover, and Lake Kickapoo. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
